<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4602</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Peruvian Manu Rainforest (Answers)</string>
            <string language="es">Selvas tropicales del manú peruano (respuestas)</string>
            <string language="ga">Foraois Bháistí Manu Peiriúch (Freagraí)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Peruanisches Manu Rainforest (Antworten)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêt tropicale Péruvienne de Manu (Réponses)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Manu Peruvian Rainforest (Respostas)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manu Peruviano Rainforest (Risposte)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περουβιανό τροπικό δάσος Manu (απαντήσεις)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Answers for the corresponding worksheet involving searching for information about rainforests from an educational website.</string>
            <string language="es">Respuestas para la hoja de trabajo correspondiente relacionada con la búsqueda de información sobre selvas tropicales en una página web educativa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Freagraí don bhileog oibre comhfhreagrach a bhaineann le heolas faoi fhoraoiseacha báistí a chuardach ó láithreán gréasáin oideachasúil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">TCF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antworten für den entsprechenden Bogen, der das 
Suchen nach Informationen über rainforests von einer pädagogischen 
Web site mit einbezieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réponses pour le tableau correspondant comportant
rechercher des informations sur des forêts tropicales d'un site Web 
éducatif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respostas para a folha correspondente que envolve 
procurarar pela informação sobre rainforests de um Web site 
educacional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risposte per il foglio di lavoro corrispondente 
che coinvolge ricerca delle informazioni sui rainforests da un Web 
site educativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαντήσεις για το αντίστοιχο φύλλο εργασίας που 
περιλαμβάνει την έρευνα για τις πληροφορίες για τα τροπικά δάση 
από έναν εκπαιδευτικό ιστοχώρο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
